name: Copper Wall
desc: A cheap defensive block. Useful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves.

name: Large Copper Wall
desc: A cheap defensive block. Useful for protecting the core and turrets in the first few waves. Spans multiple tiles.

name: Titanium Wall
desc: A moderately strong defensive block. Provides moderate protection from enemies.

name: Large Titanium Wall
desc: A moderately strong defensive block. Provides moderate protection from enemies. Spans multiple tiles.

name: Thorium Wall
desc: A strong defensive block. Decent protection from enemies.

name: Large Thorium Wall
desc: A strong defensive block. Decent protection from enemies. Spans multiple tiles.

name: Surge Wall
desc: An extremely durable defensive block. Builds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly.

name: Large Surge Wall
desc: An extremely durable defensive block. Builds up charge on bullet contact, releasing it randomly. Spans multiple tiles.

name: Plastanium Wall
desc: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections.

name: Large Plastanium Wall
desc: A special type of wall that absorbs electric arcs and blocks automatic power node connections. Spans multiple tiles.

name: Phase Wall
desc: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact.

name: Large Phase Wall
desc: A wall coated with special phase-based reflective compound. Deflects most bullets upon impact. Spans multiple tiles.

name: Conveyor
desc: Basic item transport block. Moves items forward and automatically deposits them into blocks. Rotatable.

name: Titanium Conveyor
desc: Advanced item transport block. Moves items faster than standard conveyors.

name: Junction
desc: Acts as a bridge for two crossing conveyor belts. Useful in situations with two different conveyors carrying different materials to different locations.

name: Mass Driver
desc: The ultimate item transport block. Collects several items and then shoots them to another mass driver over a long range. Requires power to operate.

name: Armored Conveyor
desc: Moves items at the same speed as titanium conveyors, but possesses more armor. Does not accept inputs from the sides from anything but other conveyor belts.

name: Bridge Conveyor
desc: Advanced item transport block. Allows transporting items over up to 3 tiles of any terrain or building.

name: Phase Conveyor
desc: Advanced item transport block. Uses power to teleport items to a connected phase conveyor over several tiles.

name: Sorter
desc: Sorts items. If an item matches the selection, it is allowed to pass. Otherwise, the item is outputted to the left and right.

name: Router
desc:
Accepts items, then outputs them to up to 3 other directions equally. Useful for splitting the materials from one source to multiple targets.
**__Never use next to production inputs, as they will get clogged by output.__**

name: Distributor
desc: An advanced router. Splits items to up to 7 other directions equally.

name: Inverted Sorter
desc: Processes items like a standard sorter, but outputs selected items to the sides instead.

name: Overflow Gate
desc: Only outputs to the left and right if the front path is blocked.

name: Underflow Gate
desc: The opposite of an overflow gate. Outputs to the front if the left and right paths are blocked.
